targets.rawSql:
with clusters as (
    SELECT
        e.name as cluster_name,
        e.oid as cluster_oid,
        count(distinct scoped_oid) filter (where s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE') as host_count
      FROM entity e
      join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
     WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
       and e.last_seen > now()
       and s.scoped_type = ('PHYSICAL_MACHINE')
       and s.finish > now()
  group by 1, 2
), 


cluster_stats as (
    SELECT entity_oid as cluster_oid
           ,time
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'CPU_HEADROOM') as cpu_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'CPU_HEADROOM') as cpu_capacity
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'MEM_HEADROOM') as mem_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'MEM_HEADROOM') as mem_capacity
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_HEADROOM') as stor_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_HEADROOM') as stor_capacity
      FROM metric
     WHERE type in ('CPU_HEADROOM', 'MEM_HEADROOM', 'STORAGE_HEADROOM')
       --AND $__timeFilter(time)
       AND time > date_trunc('day', now()) - interval '1 day'
       AND consumed is null
       and entity_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
     GROUP BY 1,2
)

select time
      ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter"
      ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name"
      ,clusters.cluster_oid
      ,time as "Scoped Time"
      ,host_count as "Current Hosts"
      ,cpu_hr as "CPU Headroom"
      ,mem_hr as "Mem Headroom"
      ,stor_hr as "Storage Headroom"
      ,least(cpu_hr, mem_hr, stor_hr) "Min Required VM Headroom"
  from clusters
  JOIN cluster_stats on clusters.cluster_oid = cluster_stats.cluster_oid

with clusters as (
    SELECT
        e.oid as cluster_oid,
        count(distinct scoped_oid) filter (where s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE') as vm_count
      FROM entity e
      join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
     WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
       and e.last_seen > now()
       and s.scoped_type = ('VIRTUAL_MACHINE')
       and s.finish > now()
  group by 1
)

select cluster_oid
      ,vm_count as "Current VMs"
  from clusters

-- Host Stats Panel
with pms_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as pm_oid,
        e.name as pm_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

ds_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as ds_oid,
        e.name as ds_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'STORAGE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pm_stats as (
     select pm_oid
          ,avg(cpu_used) as cpu_used_avg
          ,avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity 
          ,avg(mem_used) as mem_used_avg
          ,avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('CPU', 'MEM')
        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)
           and time between now() - interval '15 min' and now()
           and time >= now() - interval '15 min'
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
),


ds_stats as (
     select ds_oid
          ,avg(stor_used) as stor_used_avg
          ,avg(stor_capacity) as stor_capacity 
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as ds_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used
               ,max(capacity) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT')
           and time between now() - interval '15 min' and now()
           and time >= now() - interval '15 min'
        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'STORAGE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)

select SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       sum(cpu_used_avg)/sum(cpu_capacity)*100 as "CPU Utilization (%)",
       sum(mem_used_avg)/sum(mem_capacity)*100 as "Mem Utilization (%)",
       sum(stor_used_avg)/sum(stor_capacity)*100 as "Storage Utilization (%)"
  from pm_stats
  JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
  join ds_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.cluster_oid = ds_by_cluster.cluster_oid
  join ds_stats on ds_stats.ds_oid = ds_by_cluster.ds_oid
group by 1, 2
;

-- Host Stats Panel
with pms_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as pm_oid,
        e.name as pm_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pm_stats as (
     select pm_oid
          ,avg(cpu_used) as cpu_used_avg
          ,max(cpu_used) as cpu_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by cpu_used/cpu_capacity asc) cpu_util_percentile
          ,avg(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_avg
          ,max(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_max
          ,avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity 
          ,avg(mem_used) as mem_used_avg
          ,max(mem_used) as mem_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by mem_used/mem_capacity asc) mem_util_percentile
          ,avg(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_avg
          ,max(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_max
          ,avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'VCPU') as cpu_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'VCPU') as cpu_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'VMEM') as mem_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'VMEM') as mem_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('VCPU', 'VMEM')
        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND time between now() - interval '15 min' and now()
           AND time >= now() - interval '15 min'
           AND consumed is null
           AND entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)

select pm_name as "Virtual Machine Name",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       cpu_capacity as "CPU Capacity (MHz)",
       cpu_used_avg as "CPU Avg Used (MHz)",
       cpu_used_max as "CPU Max Used (MHz)",
       mem_capacity/1024/1024 as "Mem Capacity (GB)",
       mem_used_avg/1024/1024 as "Mem Avg Used (GB)",
       mem_used_max/1024/1024 as "Mem Max Used (GB)",
       cpu_util_avg*100 as "CPU Avg Util (%)",
       cpu_util_max*100 as "CPU Max Util (%)",
       cpu_util_percentile*100 as "CPU Percentile Util (%)",
       mem_util_avg*100 as "Mem Avg Util (%)",
       mem_util_max*100 as "Mem Max Util (%)",
       mem_util_percentile*100 as "Mem Percentile Util (%)"
  from pm_stats
  JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
;

panels.title: Cluster by Virtual Machine Utilization Details

targets.rawSql:
with clusters as (
    SELECT
        e.name as cluster_name,
        e.oid as cluster_oid,
        count(distinct scoped_oid) filter (where s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE') as host_count
      FROM entity e
      join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
     WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
       and e.last_seen > now()
       and s.scoped_type = ('PHYSICAL_MACHINE')
       and s.finish > now()
  group by 1, 2
), 


cluster_stats as (
    SELECT entity_oid as cluster_oid
           ,time
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'CPU_HEADROOM') as cpu_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'CPU_HEADROOM') as cpu_capacity
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'MEM_HEADROOM') as mem_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'MEM_HEADROOM') as mem_capacity
           ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_HEADROOM') as stor_hr
           ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_HEADROOM') as stor_capacity
      FROM metric
     WHERE type in ('CPU_HEADROOM', 'MEM_HEADROOM', 'STORAGE_HEADROOM')
       --AND $__timeFilter(time)
       AND time > date_trunc('day', now()) - interval '1 day'
       AND consumed is null
       and entity_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'

)

select time
      ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter"
      ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name"
      ,clusters.cluster_oid
      ,time as "Scoped Time"

      ,cpu_hr as "CPU Headroom"
      ,mem_hr as "Mem Headroom"
      ,stor_hr as "Storage Headroom"
      ,least(cpu_hr, mem_hr, stor_hr) "Min Required VM Headroom"
  from clusters

       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

ds_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as ds_oid,
        e.name as ds_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'STORAGE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pm_stats as (
     select pm_oid
          ,avg(cpu_used) as cpu_used_avg
          ,avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity 
          ,avg(mem_used) as mem_used_avg
          ,avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_capacity

        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)

           and time >= now() - interval '15 min'
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'

    group by 1
),


ds_stats as (
     select ds_oid
          ,avg(stor_used) as stor_used_avg
          ,avg(stor_capacity) as stor_capacity 
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as ds_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used
               ,max(capacity) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT')
           and time between now() - interval '15 min' and now()

        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)

select SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       sum(cpu_used_avg)/sum(cpu_capacity)*100 as "CPU Utilization (%)",
       sum(mem_used_avg)/sum(mem_capacity)*100 as "Mem Utilization (%)",
       sum(stor_used_avg)/sum(stor_capacity)*100 as "Storage Utilization (%)"
  from pm_stats
  JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
  join ds_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.cluster_oid = ds_by_cluster.cluster_oid
  join ds_stats on ds_stats.ds_oid = ds_by_cluster.ds_oid
group by 1, 2
;

-- Host Stats Panel
with pms_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as pm_oid,
        e.name as pm_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '15 min', now())
    -- AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    -- AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pm_stats as (
     select pm_oid
          ,avg(cpu_used) as cpu_used_avg
          ,max(cpu_used) as cpu_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by cpu_used/cpu_capacity asc) cpu_util_percentile
          ,avg(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_avg
          ,max(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_max
          ,avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity 
          ,avg(mem_used) as mem_used_avg
          ,max(mem_used) as mem_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by mem_used/mem_capacity asc) mem_util_percentile
          ,avg(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_avg
          ,max(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_max
          ,avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'VCPU') as cpu_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'VCPU') as cpu_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'VMEM') as mem_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'VMEM') as mem_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('VCPU', 'VMEM')
        -- AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND time between now() - interval '15 min' and now()
           AND time >= now() - interval '15 min'
           AND consumed is null
           AND entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)

select pm_name as "Virtual Machine Name",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       cpu_capacity as "CPU Capacity (MHz)",
       cpu_used_avg as "CPU Avg Used (MHz)",
       cpu_used_max as "CPU Max Used (MHz)",
       mem_capacity/1024/1024 as "Mem Capacity (GB)",
       mem_used_avg/1024/1024 as "Mem Avg Used (GB)",
       mem_used_max/1024/1024 as "Mem Max Used (GB)",
       cpu_util_avg*100 as "CPU Avg Util (%)",
       cpu_util_max*100 as "CPU Max Util (%)",
       cpu_util_percentile*100 as "CPU Percentile Util (%)",
       mem_util_avg*100 as "Mem Avg Util (%)",
       mem_util_max*100 as "Mem Max Util (%)",
       mem_util_percentile*100 as "Mem Percentile Util (%)"
  from pm_stats
  JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
;

panels.title: Cluster by Virtual Machine Utilization Details

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
             ,oid as __value
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
AND (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
ORDER BY 1
list.name: Datacenter
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
             ,oid as __value
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
AND (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
            ,oid as __value
   FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
  AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
  and s.scoped_oid in ($Datacenter)
list.name: Cluster
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
            ,oid as __value
   FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
  AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
  and s.scoped_oid in ($Datacenter)

title: Ultimate On-Prem Cluster and Virtual Machine Headroom
